players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso I investigated last night."
Diana: " I think Bob is the mafioso, because Charlie said he investigated him last night and Alice was found dead. If Charlie had found a villager, he would have said so."
You: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Alice last night. Charlie's statement confirms my suspicion."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso, I investigated him last night and he had a gun in his hand."
